content: As both distribution and the definition of content continues to expand beyond television it fills to newer lanes like podcasts and digital, it inures to our benefit because of the diversity and global scale of our portfolio, whether that's through our ownership of sports properties like, UFC and PBR, a representation of more than 7,000 clients, our role as a supplier in the expanding sports betting ecosystem or our portfolio of more than 1,700 annual live events and experiences.
